body_html: That's understandable but also horrifying considering "We hope you never spend hours debugging your code because of bad stack traces or asynchronous and opaque execution engines." Not exactly a stack trace, but even harder to parse. Would it make sense to add an option to turn on more expensive logging? Didn't see something like that already in place in the main documentation.
